name: Murakoshi Masami Bakuchou Nippon Rettou 2
overview: Murakoshi Seikai Bakuchou Nippon Rettou 2 (aka Murakoshi Seikai no Bakuchou Nihon Rettou 2 ) is a fishing game sponsored by japanese angler man Murakoshi Seikai. This is the second game in the series. The game got different game modes: Like sotyr and free fishing modes. In the story mode the player can choose between a male and a female character and will play in different fishing spots of the Japan seas. There are different places and fishes to catch. The free fishing is a quick way of start fishing. The game also features a complete video tutorial (called fishing lecture) by Murakoshi Seikai explaining different fishing techniques. There are also a record part to check the different fish records and even a cooking part to let the player cook the fishes that he catch.
